channel.title: The Middle East war
channel.description:
I need to find out how and why it started.
Apparently the teacher said it goes much much deeper than just the kidnappings commited by the lebanease
Also another theory I heard about the war is that America is funding the war both ways, is this true?

item.title: The Middle East war
item.dc:creator: @soul_raever soul raever
item.description:
@soul_raever wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:27, topic:10215”][quote author=soul raever link=topic=14873.msg219104#msg219104 date=1157506894]

None of ‘the book of lies’ has been proven to be lies whatsoever. One guy’s life was devoted to finding an inconsistancy in the bible - somethig he could prove wrong. After 20 years, he realised that he had no other choice but to believe it.

Please don’t say things like that when you have absolutely no evidence to back them up. Alot of the bible has even been historically proven to be accurate.

If they have the right to believe its true, I have the right to believe its false.
Its just my opinion don’t take it personally.
[/quote]u no the parting of the sea thing with moses or whater hes called its been proven possible

Proven possible to do it now… with alot of wind and such… but not a little stick you fool.

Anywasy moses was a goat herder called chiko.[/quote]

as the story got passed down the story changed gradually so he probbs dint do it with a staff… it was probbs an addition to the story

Read full topic
